document_data.caption: Various scam games.
document_data.name: Scam Games
document_data.mainbody: '''Scam games''' referred to a variety of items in the Realms used to cheat others out of money.
document_data.Description: Scam games included such items as weighted [[dice]], marked decks of cards, etc.
document_data.History: These items were available for purchase through ''[[Aurora's Whole Realms Catalogue]]'' for 3–5 [[gold piece]]s.
document_data.Notable Users: * Scam games were often used by [[thieves]] or [[rogues]] to take advantage of gamblers, particularly a variety of rogue known as [[swindler]]s.<ref>
